title: $1111 -- Amsterdam and Paris: 6-Night Vacations, Inc. Air
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $1111 -- Amsterdam and Paris: 6-Night Vacations, Inc. Air $1111 -- Amsterdam and Paris: 6-Night Vacations, Inc. Air   2, 2015 at 2:07 PM 
Why visit a single major European metropolis when you can take in two in one go? Tripmasters is featuring vacation packages good for travel to both Paris and Amsterdam, including air included from $1,111 per person. 
The deal includes: Round-trip airfare from New York City's JFK airport; other departure cities are available at varying rates Airline and hotel taxes, plus fuel surcharges Three nights' accommodations in Amsterdam Three nights' accommodations in Paris Breakfast daily (dependent on preferred hotel) 
How to get this deal: Visit Tripmasters 's website. Travel at these rates is valid with departures from New York's JFK airport on December 11, 2015, but other dates and departure cities are available. The sale provider hasn't listed a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
